dt-option.name: paging.buttons
dt-option.summary: Set the maximum number of paging number buttons
dt-option.description:
< For DataTables 2.0.0-2.0.3 this parameter was called `paging.numbers`, but was renamed as the naming was not discoverable. For 2.0.x backwards compatibility will be retained, but removed in 2.1.
DataTables built in pagination control has the ability to show a variable amount of page number buttons. The default is 7, but you might want to show less depending on your layout. The number given should always be **odd**.
Please note that DataTables pagination control is responsive. It will automatically remove number buttons until the control fits onto a single line, as required by the page's layout.
